feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Azure NAT Gateway considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of NAT Gateway that are useful when you work with multitenanted systems. It also provides links to guidance and examples for how to use NAT Gateway in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Teacher-provisioned virtual labs in Azure
entry.summary: Learn how you can use Azure Lab Services to set up identical VMs from templates, for use in training, customer demos, and software development.

entry.title: Automate document processing by using Azure Form Recognizer
entry.summary: Build an automated document processing pipeline. Use Azure Form Recognizer to extract data and natural language processing models to enrich the data.

entry.title: SWIFT Alliance Access on Azure
entry.summary: This article provides a reference architecture for deploying and running SWIFT Alliance Access on Azure.

entry.title: SWIFT Alliance Messaging Hub (AMH) on Azure
entry.summary: This article provides a reference architecture for deploying and running SWIFT Alliance Messaging Hub (AMH) on Azure.

entry.title: SWIFT on Azure
entry.summary: This article is a landing page for all SWIFT components that can be deployed on Azure.

entry.title: Loosely coupled quantum computing
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Quantum to implement hybrid quantum applications that use a loosely coupled model.

entry.title: Tightly coupled quantum computing
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Quantum to implement hybrid quantum applications that use a tightly coupled model.

entry.title: DevOps for quantum computing
entry.summary: Learn about DevOps requirements for quantum-based apps. DevOps provides a repeatable, high-quality process for building, deploying, and monitoring software.

entry.title: CI/CD for quantum computing jobs
entry.summary: Learn how to orchestrate CI/CD of the quantum computing components of your classical applications to create replicable, manageable hybrid solutions.

entry.title: Azure digital twins builder
entry.summary: Learn how a web app can use Azure Digital Twins and Autodesk Forge API to accelerate the process of creating digital twins from Build Information Modeling (BIM) models.

entry.title: Deploy machine learning models to multiple lines
entry.summary: This article describes an architecture that you can use to deploy machine learning models to multiple data sources.

entry.title: Automating diagnostic Jupyter Notebook execution
entry.summary: Learn now to automate diagnostic or routine notebooks by using an Azure serverless architecture.

entry.title: DevOps checklist
entry.summary: DevOps integrates development, quality assurance, and IT operations and offers processes for delivering software. Assess your DevOps culture and process.

entry.title: Secure research environment for regulated data
entry.summary: Architecture on Azure that shows a regulated environment for researchers to access sensitive data while providing a higher level of control and data protection.

entry.title: Baseline architecture for an AKS cluster
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a baseline infrastructure that deploys an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster.

entry.title: AKS regulated cluster for PCI-DSS 3.2.1 - Network segmentation
entry.summary: Best practices for setting up networking as per Requirement 1 and 2 of PCI-DSS 3.2.1.

entry.title: Security and identity with Azure and AWS
entry.summary: Get guidance for integrating security and identity services across Azure and AWS. Explore strong authentication and explicit trust validation, PIM, and more.

entry.title: Automate multistage DevOps pipelines with Azure Pipelines
entry.summary: Eliminate tedious tasks by automating your pipeline with Azure DevOps REST APIs, Azure Logic Apps, and Azure Pipelines.

entry.title: Automate multistage DevOps pipelines with Azure Pipelines
entry.summary: Eliminate tedious tasks by automating your pipeline with Azure DevOps REST APIs, Azure Logic Apps, and Azure Pipelines.

entry.title: Data analysis for regulated industries
entry.summary: This article describes an architecture for data analysis workloads for regulated industries. The architecture includes ETL/ELT and Power BI.

entry.title: Governance of Teams guest users
entry.summary: Learn how to use Microsoft Teams and Azure AD entitlement management to collaborate with other organizations, while maintaining control over resource use.

entry.title: Choose an Azure multiparty computing service
entry.summary: Use this chart and other information to decide which multiparty computing services to use for your solution.

entry.title: Azure resource organization in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This article describes how to organize your Azure resources in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Application data protection for AKS workloads on Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Deploy Astra Control Service with Azure NetApp Files for data protection, disaster recovery, and mobility for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) applications.

entry.title: SQL Managed Instance with CMK
entry.summary: Create a highly available SQL Managed Instance design by using customer-managed keys stored in Azure Key Vault.

entry.title: Enhanced-security hybrid messaging — client access
entry.summary: This article describes an architecture to enhance your security in a client access scenario by using Azure AD Multi-Factor Authentication.

entry.title: Enhanced-security hybrid messaging — mobile access
entry.summary: This article describes an architecture to enhance your security in a mobile access scenario by using Azure AD Multi-Factor Authentication.

entry.title: Enhanced-security hybrid messaging — web access
entry.summary: This article describes an architecture to help you enhance your security in a web access scenario by using Azure AD Multi-Factor Authentication.

entry.title: Extract text from objects using Power Automate and AI Builder
entry.summary: Use AI Builder and Azure Form Recognizer in a Power Automate workflow to extract text from images, for indexing and retrieval.

entry.title: Azure files secured by AD DS
entry.summary: Learn how to provide secure Azure files that are secured by on-premises Windows Server Active Directory domain services (AD DS), and accessed on-premises.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for networking in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This article describes approaches to consider for networking in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: AI-based footfall detection
entry.summary: The article provides an overview for implementing an AI-based footfall detection solution, which analyzes visitor traffic in retail stores. The solution generates insights from real-world actions, by using Azure, Azure Stack Hub, and the Custom Vision AI Dev Kit.

entry.title: Update route tables by using Azure Route Server
entry.summary: Use Azure Route Server to manage the dynamic routing between NVAs and virtual networks. Simplify NVA maintenance, and avoid manually updating route tables.

entry.title: Manage Microsoft 365 tenant configuration with Azure DevOps
entry.summary: This article describes how to manage Microsoft 365 tenant configuration by using Microsoft365DSC and Azure DevOps.

entry.title: Enterprise file shares with disaster recovery
entry.summary: Learn how to implement resilient NetApp file shares. Failure of the primary Azure region causes automatic failover to the secondary Azure region.

entry.title: Blue/green app deployments
entry.summary: This article describes a high-availability blue/green deployment solution for applications on Azure Spring Cloud.

entry.title: Solutions for the energy and environment industries
entry.summary: Architectures and ideas for using Azure services to build efficient, scalable, and reliable solutions in the energy and environment industries.

entry.title: Azure App Service and Azure Functions considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure App Service and Azure Functions that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and links to guidance and examples for how to use Azure App Service and Azure Functions in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Azure Machine Learning architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to build, deploy, and manage high-quality models with Azure Machine Learning, a service for the end-to-end ML lifecycle.

entry.title: Enhanced customer dimension with Dynamics 365 Customer Insights
entry.summary: Use Dynamics 365 Customer Insights to create an enhanced customer dataset and make it available in Azure Data Lake for consumption by Azure Synapse Analytics.

entry.title: Scalable cloud applications and SRE
entry.summary: Build scalable cloud applications by using performance modeling and other principles and practices of site reliability engineering (SRE).

entry.title: Network-hardened web app
entry.summary: Architecture for integrating a WAF-enabled web app into a hardened network environment that forces all inbound and outbound flows through a firewall appliance.

entry.title: CI/CD for Windows desktop apps
entry.summary: This article describes how to use MSIX to enable CI/CD for building, deploying, and updating Windows desktop applications.

entry.title: Architecting multitenant solutions on Azure
entry.summary: This article introduces how to build multitenant solutions on Azure and the guidance we provide throughout this series.

entry.summary: This article introduces the guidance we provide for using many distinct Azure services in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Modeling stage of the Team Data Science Process lifecycle
entry.summary: The goals, tasks, and deliverables for the modeling stage of your data-science projects

entry.title: Azure Virtual Desktop for the enterprise
entry.summary: Explore Azure Virtual Desktop and learn to build virtual desktop infrastructure solutions at enterprise scale.

entry.title: Migrate AIX workloads to Skytap on Azure
entry.summary: This example illustrates a migration of AIX logical partitions (LPARs) to Skytap on Azure.

entry.title: Monitor hybrid availability, performance
entry.summary: Use Azure Monitor to monitor performance and availability for OS workloads running on-premises, in third-party cloud providers, and in Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Consumer health portal on Azure
entry.summary: In this example scenario, explore an Azure architecture for a consumer health portal in a digital health solution.

entry.title: Azure Machine Learning Anomaly Detection API
entry.summary: Anomaly Detection API is an example built with Microsoft Azure Machine Learning. It detects anomalies in time series data with numerical values that are uniformly spaced in time.

entry.title: Analytics end-to-end with Azure Synapse
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Data Services to build a modern analytics platform capable of handling the most common data challenges in an organization.

entry.title: Feature engineering in machine learning
entry.summary: Learn about feature engineering and its role in the data enhancement process of machine learning.

entry.title: Scalable order processing
entry.summary: This example demonstrates a highly scalable, resilient architecture for e-commerce order processing, using managed Azure services such as Cosmos DB and HDInsight.

entry.title: Getting started with Azure IoT solutions
entry.summary: An overview of Azure IoT architectures. Learn basic concepts around getting started with Azure IoT, how to get started building an IoT solution, or understand how to optimize an IoT solution for production.

entry.title: SAP system on Oracle Database on Azure
entry.summary: Examine deployment patterns for SAP systems on Oracle Database that align with the pillars of the Azure Well-Architected Framework.

entry.title: Securely managed web applications
entry.summary: Learn about deploying secure applications using the Azure App Service Environment, the Azure Application Gateway service, and Web Application Firewall.

entry.title: E-commerce front end
entry.summary: This example scenario implements an e-commerce front end using Azure platform as a service tools, which allow you to handle increases in transactions.

entry.title: Baseball decision analysis with ML.NET and Blazor
entry.summary: This scenario describes a web application that provides an interface for on-technical users to use artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) to perform decision analysis techniques. These techniques help you rapidly gain insights and make informed predictions.

entry.title: Campaign optimization with SQL Server
entry.summary: Optimize when and how to contact potential customers to improve marketing campaign success rates with machine learning and SQL Server 2016 with R Services.

entry.title: Retail and e-commerce using Cosmos DB
entry.summary: Use Azure Cosmos DB for retail and e-commerce apps to support in-depth queries over diverse product catalogs, traffic spikes, and rapidly changing inventory.

entry.title: Retail - Buy online, pick-up in store (BOPIS)
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure IoT to enhance a retail solution for stores implementing buy online, pickup in store scenarios.

entry.title: Extend your on-premises big data investments with HDInsight
entry.summary: Extend your on-premises big data investments to the cloud. Transform your business by using the advanced analytics capabilities of Azure HDInsight.

entry.title: Virtual WAN architecture optimized for department-specific requirements
entry.summary: This article describes how to design a single network that has varying security and performance requirements.

entry.title: Moodle deployment with Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Deploy Moodle with Azure NetApp Files for a resilient solution that offers high-throughput, low-latency access to scalable shared storage.

entry.summary: Learn about the reference architecture that can help you deploy a solution based on Azure DevTest Labs in your enterprise.

entry.title: Exploratory data analysis with Azure Synapse serverless and a lakehouse
entry.summary: Synapse serverless is a fast way to do EDA over a data lake or lakehouse. Self-service analytics is easy for business analysts who understand some SQL.

entry.summary: This article describes approaches to consider for cost management and cost allocation in a multitenant solution.

entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Resource Manager that are useful when you work with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples for how to use Azure Resource Manager in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Manage virtual machine compliance
entry.summary: Manage virtual machine compliance without impairing DevOps practices. Use Azure VM Image Builder and Azure Compute Gallery to minimize risk from system images.

entry.summary: Many machine learning (ML) problems are too complex for a single ML model to solve. Learn about many models machine learning at scale with Azure Machine Learning.

entry.summary: Many machine learning (ML) problems are too complex for a single ML model to solve. Learn about many models machine learning at scale in Azure with Spark.

entry.title: Connected factory signal pipeline
entry.summary: The connected factory signal pipeline architecture provides a common configuration interface to connect brownfield IoT devices through an OPC Unified Architecture (UA) gateway using custom APIs, and KEPServerEX IoT Gateway.

entry.summary: This article demonstrates how to conceptualize, architect, build, and deploy an application that uses projects from the CNCF after deployment of AKS.

entry.summary: Learn about Azure services that can help you build a multiparty computing solution, which can include cloud-based and on-premises resources.

entry.title: Hybrid file share with disaster recovery for remote and local branch workers
entry.summary: Learn how to provide high-availability desktop access to file shares in an environment with many on-premises locations, and a workforce that works on-premises and remotely.

entry.title: Improved-security access to multitenant web apps from an on-premises network
entry.summary: Set up improved-security private connectivity to a multitenant web app or function app from an on-premises network or from within an Azure virtual network.

entry.summary: This architecture provides an example delta lake for travel booking, where large amounts of raw documents are generated at a high frequency.

entry.summary: Application Gateway is commonly used to load balance traffic to Container Instances container groups. This article explores automation for rotated IP addresses.

entry.summary: How to use Azure Cosmos DB, change feed, and Azure Service Bus for reliable messaging and guaranteed delivery of domain events in distributed applications.

entry.summary: Learn about scaling Azure AI and machine learning environments that must comply with extensive security policies.

entry.title: Long-term security log retention with Azure Data Explorer
entry.summary: Store security logs in Azure Data Explorer on a long-term basis. This solution minimizes costs and provides easy access when you need to query the data.

entry.title: Multilayered protection for Azure virtual machines
entry.summary: Protect Azure VMs by implementing two types of just-in-time access. Align with security principles like defense in depth, least privilege, and zero trust.

entry.summary: This architecture uses Azure Stream Analytics to ingest data to an Azure Synapse dedicated SQL pool in high throughput scenarios.

entry.summary: Deploy an application on Azure virtual machines in multiple regions for high availability and resiliency.

entry.summary: Use Microsoft AI to improve website content tagging accuracy by combining deep learning and natural language processing (NLP) with data on site-specific search terms.
